How many people are affected by ornithine translocase deficiency ?,Ornithine translocase deficiency is a very rare disorder. Fewer than 100 affected individuals have been reported worldwide.,GHR,ornithine translocase deficiency
What are the genetic changes related to ornithine translocase deficiency ?,"Mutations in the SLC25A15 gene cause ornithine translocase deficiency.  Ornithine translocase deficiency belongs
